description: In the Underworld, during the fight against Hades, the 12 Gold Saints gave up their lives to destroy the Wailing Wall and allow Seiya and his friends to keep moving forward. Aioria and the Gold Saints, who should have disappeared, come back to life in this beautiful Earth full of light. How have they resurrected if they were supposed to be dead? While the big mystery remains, Aioria gets involved in a new battle and when his Cosmo exceeds its limits.. a change happens to the Leo Cloth!

REGULAR.description:
The 12 Gold Saints gave their lives to destroy the Wailing Wall to break the way for Seiya and the Saints in their battle against Hades in the Underworld. Though presumed to have perished, Aiolia and the other Gold Saints return to the beautiful earthly world of radiating luminescence. Why have these lost souls been brought back to life? Following a new encounter, Aiolia becomes embroiled in a duel amid this deep mystery. And when he burns his Cosmo to its limit…the Cloth of Leo transforms!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Gold Legend Revived!
Tornate alla vita, cavalieri d`oro
Yomigaere! Ougon Densetsu
よみがえれ! 黄金伝説

REGULAR.description:
Aiolia defeats God Warrior Frodi. However, he passes out as the mysterious marks reappear. Lyfia runs about to save Aiolia, but she, too, collapses. When she awakens, she finds she’s been taken in by a boy and Aries Mu with a Gold Cloth Box.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abake! Yggdrasil no Himitsu
The Secret of Yggdrasil Revealed!
暴け!ユグドラシルの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Scorpio Miro finally faces off against one of the God Warriors, Surt. However, standing in his way is none other than Gold Saint Aquarius Camus! Meanwhile in town, Aiolia and Lyfia run into Cancer Deathmask on their quest for Yggdrasil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekitotsu! Gold Saint vs Gold Saint
Gold vs. Gold: Clash of the Saints!
Scontro micidiale! Cavaliere d`Oro contro Cavaliere d`Oro!
激突! 黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]VS黄金聖闘士[ゴールドセイント]

REGULAR.description:
When Miro’s life is at stake under Surt’s malicious scheme, there emerges the strongest Gold Saint of Athena – Gemini Saga! Meanwhile, Helena, whom Deathmask secretly fancies, falls for the ferocious God Warrior Fafner’s offer for “medical treatment”.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adunata! I sette cavalieri di Asgard!
Shuuketsu! Nananin no Shintoushi
The 7 God Warriors Assembled!
集結! 七人の神闘士

REGULAR.description:
Learning of the God Cloths’ powers from Shaka, Mu telepathically tells Aiolia and Lyfia, who are headed to Yggdrasil, that its barrier can be broken using their God Cloths to raise their Cosmo to the limit to attack the 3 key points of the Great Root.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: God Cloth`s Ultimate Power!
Kyuukyoku! God Cloth no Chikara
Limite estremo! La forza delle armature divine!
究極! 神聖衣[ゴッドクロス]の力

REGULAR.description:
The Gold Saints are lured into Yggdrasil by Andreas after breaking Fimbulwinter. Lyfia states the brewing evil can be stopped by destroying the statues in the 7 chambers. The Gold Saints advance with renewed resolve, while a change occurs in Lyfia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entering the 7 Chambers of Yggdrasil!
Totsunyuu! Yggdrasil no Nanatsu no Ma
突入! ユグドラシルの7つの間

REGULAR.description:
A showdown of Gold Saints vs. God Warriors in the 7 chambers starts at last! Taurus Aldebaran faces God Warrior Hercules yet again. Meanwhile, in the chamber of ice, Gold Saints Shura and Camus engage in an ultimate battle of God Cloth vs. God Cloth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekishin! God Cloth vs God Cloth
Showdown: God Cloth vs. God Cloth!
激震! 神聖衣[ゴッドクロス]VS神聖衣[ゴッドクロス]

REGULAR.description:
Shaka, the man closest to the gods, faces God Warrior Balder in the chamber of light. He lives up to his reputation, but Balder subdues him with immense power! Meanwhile, Deathmask takes Fafner to the gateway to the land of the dead to settle all scores.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Balder! Kami ni Erabareshi Otoko
Balder, the Man Chosen by the Gods!
バルドル! 神に選ばれし男

REGULAR.description:
Sigmund, determined to avenge his younger brother Siegfried, is brushed aside by the immense power of the “strongest” Gold Saint Saga. Meanwhile, in the chamber of the brave, a fierce battle continues between Aiolia and Frodi, when Lyfia steps in!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saga! Atsuki Kyoudai no Kizuna
Saga, the Unbreakable Bond of Brothers!
サガ! 熱き兄弟の絆

REGULAR.description:
Holding Lyfia’s words close to heart, Aiolia finally faces Andreas! Andreas scornfully recounts how he manipulated Lyfia. Fuming with rage, Aiolia’s immense Cosmo turns into a God Cloth! Meanwhile, Frodi is cornered by Utgardar’s forceful swordplay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash: Aiolia vs. Andreas!
Kessen! Aiolia tai Andreas
決戦! アイオリアVS[たい]アンドレアス

REGULAR.description:
The ultimate forbidden attack Athena Exclamation by Mu, Saga, and Dohko annihilates Andreas! However, the evil fruit continues to grow, swallowing the Gold Saints! While stripped of his Gold Cloth, Aiolia faces Loki with a burning Cosmo in his heart!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukkatsu! Asgard no Jashin Loki
The Return of the False God Loki!
復活! アスガルドの邪神ロキ

REGULAR.description:
Empowered by his brother’s determination, Lyfia’s faith, and the Odin Robe, Aiolia, with Odin’s sword and Draupnir in hand, faces off against Loki! The ultimate battle reaches its climax - Aiolia’s fist vs. the Spear of Gungnir – who will take victory?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanjou! Jingi Gungnir no Yari
The Sacred Spear of Gungnir Reborn!
誕生! 神器グングニルの槍

REGULAR.description:
All 12 Gold Saints gather since the Wailing Wall! With the purpose of reviving on earth close at heart, they face the false god Loki who’s armed with the Spear of Gungnir! However, the 12 Gold Saints are overpowered by the absolute power of god.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let Our Prayers Be Heard! The Eternal Golden Legend!
Todoke Warera no Omoi! Eien no Ougon Densetsu
届け我らの想い! 永遠の黄金伝説
Opening
Ending
Saint Seiya: Soul of Gold
Saint Seiya: Soul of Gold
聖闘士星矢 -黄金魂 soul of gold-
聖闘士星矢 黄金魂-soul of gold-
